languages.text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону Стратегического плана дает всем союзникам {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} переместиться на 1 клетку, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Affecting a Combat Tactics area with a stratagem grants all allies in the area an ability to move for 1 cell without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g} дает всем союзникам {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} переместиться на 1 клетку, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
Использование стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана дает всем союзникам {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} переместиться на 1 клетку, не провоцируя атаки по возможности.

languages.text: 对任意{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，可以让该区域内所有盟友获得额外移动1格的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对任意战斗策略区域使用战略能力时，可以让该区域内所有盟友获得额外移动1格的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Utilizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} en una zona creada mediante {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g} otorga a todos los aliados presentes en ella la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de moverse 1 casilla sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Utilizar una estratagema en una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate otorga a todos los aliados presentes en ella la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de moverse 1 casilla sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: Die Anwendung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} auf ein {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet gewährt allen dortigen Verbündeten die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, sich 1 Feld zu bewegen, ohne einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} zu provozieren.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Anwendung eines Strategems auf ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet gewährt allen dortigen Verbündeten die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, sich 1 Feld zu bewegen, ohne einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} zu provozieren.

languages.text: L'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} dans une zone de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g} confère à tous les alliés présents dans la zone la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de se déplacer de 1 case sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation d'un Stratagème dans une zone de Tactiques de Combat confère à tous les alliés présents dans la zone la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de se déplacer de 1 case sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: 軍略エリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、そのエリア内のすべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発せずに1セル移動する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area grants all allies in the area the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move 1 cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 軍略エリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、そのエリア内のすべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発せずに1セル移動する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Bir {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanında {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullanmak, o alandaki tüm dost birimlere {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemeden 1 hücre hareket etme {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kazandırır.
